title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or Chat endpoints in chains, agents, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile-friendly).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, POJO mapping, Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot (simonw/ollama-copilot)
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot CLI replacement that uses Ollama models for code completions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) for running Ollama containerised.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Template repo showing how to build a Chainlit chat UI backed by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda Community Connector that delegates BPMN service tasks to Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Enhanced Node CLI for Ollama with prompt history, syntax highlighting and REPL mode.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that talks to Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama chat/completion endpoints inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rag-Weaviate
summary: Recipe notebook showing RAG with Ollama LLM + Weaviate vector DB in Python.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that routes user prompts to Ollama and streams replies into threads.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API that wraps Ollama for multi-user chat with token quotas.
